reviewText: "Join Schoolhouse Rocky as he takes you and your friends down to the Conjunction Junction Diner, where the special of the day is Schoolhouse Rock. Learning about Grammar, Multiplication, Science, American History and Money is easy when you sing along with Schoolhouse Rock. Rocky serves up your favorite Schoolhouse Rock videos from the jukebox, including: 1. Grammar Rock (Interjections!; A Noun Is A Person, Place Or Thing). 2. America Rock (Im Just A Bill; The Great American Melting Pot). 3. Multiplication Rock (My Hero, Zero; Luck Seven Sampson). 4. Science Rock (The Body Machine; Interplanet Janet). 5. Money Rock (Dollars and Cents; Where The Money Goes). 'As your body grows bigger, your mind must flower, it's great to learn, 'cause knowledge is power.'"
